alert.note: Alert for Bent; Las Animas; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 5:23PM MDT until July 19 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Otero County in southeastern Colorado... Northeastern Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... Southwestern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 523 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles south of Higbee, or 30 miles south of North La Junta, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Otero, northeastern Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
